title: Immigration and Nationality Act of 1965 - outcome

content.prompt: Which of the following is true of the Immigration and Nationality Act of 1965 ?

choices.label: It banned immigration from communist-controlled countries into the United States.
It eliminated the quotas based on national origins adopted in the 1920s.
It lowered the quotas for citizens of Asian and African countries who could immigrate into the United States.
It contributed to a rise in the percent of immigrants from Western European countries.
It was declared unconstitutional by the Supreme Court.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
